page.title: 14PEOPLE WHO HELP US IN EASSIE
page.content: Our postmen deliver mail in our area once every day except Sundays. It comes from Forfar Post Office by van. Milk is brought from a dairy in Newtyle to most of the households four times each week. School dinners are cooked at Newtyle School and served by our dinner-lady, who also does the washing-up and keeps our school clean. The school doctor and dentist visit our school every year and sometimes a school nurse comes to see us.Our own doctors live in Newtyle or Forfar. The dustbin men come on Tuesday mornings to take away our rubbish.
